lead_paragraph: Vestas Wind Systems said it had been awarded a $1.2 billion deal to supply 278 wind turbines for Europe’s largest wind power project.

headline.print_headline: Vestas Wind Systems Gets Contract for 278 Turbines
headline.main: Vestas Wind Systems Gets Contract for Europe’s Largest Windfarm

snippet: Vestas Wind Systems said it had been awarded a $1.2 billion deal to supply 278 wind turbines for Europe’s largest wind power project.
abstract: Vestas Wind Systems is awarded 1.1 billion euro, or $1.2 billion, deal to supply 278 wind turbines for Norwegian power company Statkraft for Europe's biggest wind power project.
